Description: Postcard; printed paper; monochrome (sepia) photograph showing Consul Square, Alexandria.
Curator's comments: Old card; postally unused but message on the reverse reads: "2) you soon. I am afraid I cannot quite locate this one now the next. The fourth ... is where my friend Webb is & where perhaps one of us will soon be going. We haven't heard any more news yet. Well, dearest, how are you getting on? Today is Good Friday. Do you remember last year? I do- in the morning you were going to church with me but you didn't & we decided to stay I got cross - I know it". The message is a continuation of that on EPH-ME 2929. See also EPH-ME 2917.
Associated places: Topographic representation of: Place des Consuls
